about.title: About Vanesa
about.desc: Meet Vanesa, the creative soul behind Studio Nesa. Based in Latvia, crafting handmade products for over 12 years.
about.bio: Vanesa was born in Latvia. She graduated with a degree in Chemistry from the University of Latvia and is currently pursuing her Master’s degree. Vanesa has been passionate about handmade creations for over 12 years, crafting unique pieces that carry a story.
about.instagram: You can explore more of her works on Instagram:
about.note: If you liked a product or want something unique, feel free to fill out the contact form, Vanesa would love to create something just for you.
